verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daiva darshanamuna Yaakobu divyamuganu Choochi aa stalamunaku bethelaniyedi naamamunu Thaanidiye sustiramuga mana parama thandri Vasiyinchedi stalamidiye{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devuni nitchenagu kristu diviki niluvabadenu Devuni dootalu daanipaini ekkuchu Diguchunnaaru devuni mandira midiye Kaani vere stalamidikaadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nishchayamugaa nee stalamandu nilichi Yunde nehovaa aashcharya paralokapu Gavini rakshana bondaga raare vishraanti Devuniki kalugu paapiki bhayankaramu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Unnatha stalamula nekkinchi aanandimpa Jesi anubhavamu nandu Yaakobu swastyamu Nosangi aiguptu yavamaanamunu Doralimpa jeyunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parvatamulu thatharilli tholagi poyinanu Sarvadaa thana krupa thodai ninnu Nadipinchunu poorvamandu palikina matala Nirvahinchunu neelo{/lang-eng}
